title: "I just don't think Aurelion Sol does a lot of damage."

replies.body: Whatever it was, it also told them the solution was going Xerath support.

Hey, I like Xerath Support D: !
Not as good as Vel'Koz tho xD

_"Taric's stun is worse now than when he had a point and click."_

Lolwut?
I don't care that Taric is viable now. I miss old Taric

A.K.A I cant hit an AOE stun or position myself correctly.

#Thatsnoneofmybusiness

early game his damage is a lot lower, especially compared to how much mana he uses in order to keep his stars out. Late game however, it is definitely considerable! 

His damage is also a lot less consistent relative to most mages, as his w and q are both easily avoidable without ally help (moreso than most skillshots).

> [{quoted}](name=Celestial Bodied,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cRaEfQR2,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-14T04:19:42.067+0000)
>  his w and q are both easily avoidable without ally help.

Is THAT what you think?
Interesting.
*scribbles notes in a notebook*
I mean, the damage compensates for his lack of mobility and him being visible in bushes, so yea.

http://nowiknow.com/wp-content/uploads/hiroshima_shadow_2.png "An ally has been slain" (This is one of the infamous Hiroshima/Nagasaki Shadows. The Human was vaporized instantly, but their shadow remained.)
The world isn't a cuddly place
he is 13th on highest damage done per game  which is pretty ffing high but this inludes all damage

I mean... He doesn't deal any damage if he can't get it off...
I overextended as GP while being low health.
I just walked towards my tower, inside of his circle.
When I was close enough he couldn't stun me either...
The champion just outplays himself if his teammates don't CC ya for him, or when he has ult....
